title: Font size seems to be impacted by the padding setting
body:
Changing the padding sometimes makes a bitmap font blurry:

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34467/201967909-d2178e98-2da1-4e8c-8a22-56f253f3b9bc.mp4

### System

OS: Linux (Arch, X11, i3)
Version: `alacritty 0.11.0 (8dbaa0bb)`

### Config

Minimal repro config:

```yml
font:
    normal:
        family: ProfontOTB
    bold:
        style: Regular
    size: 8.5

window:
    padding:
        x: 2
        y: 2
```

Font: https://tobiasjung.name/downloadfile.php?file=profont-otb-2.zip
